players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "This is terrible! Diana is gone on the first night. We need to work together to find the mafia. Has anyone noticed anything suspicious yet?"
Bob: "It's a tough loss with Diana. We should all share our thoughts and any observations from the interactions so far. No one should stay silent."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafia. We must vote her out today."
You: "Charlie, that's a very bold claim to make! If you're really the detective, why would you expose yourself so early? This seems like a desperate mafia play to get an easy mislynch on day 1."
Bob: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice? That seems like an odd choice for a first investigation. Alice, your reaction is also suspiciously defensive."
Charlie: "I am the detective and my investigation clearly shows Alice is mafia. Bob, trust me and vote Alice out."
